channel.title: Comments on: Episode 3 Mastering Client Communications
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/episode-3-mastering-client-communications/#comment-610">Jackie D'Elia</a>.
Thanks for sharing, Jackie. Something we can probably all improve on!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jackie D’Elia.

Thanks for sharing, Jackie. Something we can probably all improve on!

item.title: By: Jackie D'Elia
item.dc:creator: Jackie D'Elia
item.description:
To be successful in your freelance business it is crucial that you develop solid communication skills for managing clients and projects. Erin shares tips on how to avoid nightmare clients, and become efficient and effective with your client communications.
It is a skill that everyone will benefit from.
item.content:encoded:
To be successful in your freelance business it is crucial that you develop solid communication skills for managing clients and projects. Erin shares tips on how to avoid nightmare clients, and become efficient and effective with your client communications.

It is a skill that everyone will benefit from.
